transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji Vishal sir Vishal sir Dev baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji ji bataiye sir.
Executive: Haan haan wo call aa rahi thi. Accha theek hai ek minute madam se baat ho gayi na meri ek madam se aapki theek hai theek hai. 
Customer: Haan ji haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Sir ye na madam se meri baat hui thi waise kitna madam abhi dekho maine pehle staff pe chhoda hua tha main personally isme involve hoke na isko kaam ko karwata hu. Kyunki problem hamare paas na matlab paise hi lage ja rahe hain aur matlab koi nahi aa pa raha hai. 
Customer: Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Ya to hum log hum log galat kar rahe hain kuch hamare se ho nahi pa raha ya jo bhi hai problem wo dekhna padega na kyuki agar business aur log kar rahe hain to hamare paas bhi aana chahiye aur hum to matlab real manufacturer hai aisa nahi hai hum material bazar se le rahe hain hum real manufacturer hai. 
Executive: Ji ji karte hain.
Customer: To wo hum log apni manufacturing mein busy rehte hain to thoda dhyan nahi de paate to ab main isko dekhta hu thoda sa aap dekhiye kal kal 12 baje wo keh rahe hain to main personally involve hoke na isme zoom meeting mein leke. 
Executive: Karte hain karte hain bilkul bilkul sir haan ho jayega.
Customer: Aap thoda jaldi main apni daughter ko de deta hu aap subah 10 baje ke baad call 10:30 baje call kar sakte hain sir?
Executive: Haan haan subah koi dikkat nahi hai sir.
Customer: Haan haan 10:30 10 baje nahi rakh sakte hain koi dikkat nahi hai theek hai aap mera number de dijiye unko maine same number pe whatsapp kar diya apna theek hai same number pe maine whatsapp bhi abhi dekha hai Dev naam hai mera theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai theek hai theek hai subah karte hain haan save kar lijiye aur abhi sir aapko mail pe ek feedback bhi aayega please us pe satisfied kar dijiyega kyuki ticket ticket open ho gayi thi theek hai.
Customer: Okay yes karna hai na usko?
Executive: Ji ji ji satisfied yes karna hai.
Customer: Okay okay satisfied yes kar dunga sir main kar dunga theek hai theek hai kal aap 10 10:30 baje isi number pe baat kar lena sir.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Haan haan 10 baje 10 baje kar lunga mera number de dijiye. 10:30 baje abhi dekhiye ek minute ek minute chalu rakhiye.
Executive: Ek hi din hai.
Customer: Sir ek minute dekhiye mail check kijiyega ek aaya hoga aapke paas mail.
Executive: Sir mail na abhi main us pe laptop pe nahi hu main mobile mein bhi aa jayega same theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Nahi mobile pe bhi aayega?
Executive: Haan haan mobile par bhi aa jayega mobile mein mail hoga na us pe aa jayega.
Customer: Nahi mobile pe bhi chala.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai main share kar de raha hu us pe satisfied yes karna hai theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai main share kar de raha hu. Ji ji ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- No ROI despite spending money.

- Feels either they are doing something wrong.

- Wants business to come to them.



Resolution:

- Executive assured resolution in Zoom meeting.

- Asked to provide feedback on mail.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect at 10:30 AM next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- roi, zoom meeting, feedback, buyleads
